statement.p: The four sequential sides of a quadrilateral have lengths \displaystyle{a}={5.8}, \displaystyle{b}={6.6}, \displaystyle{c}={7.6}, and \displaystyle{d}={9.3} (all measured in yards). The angle between the two smallest sides is \displaystyle\alpha={97}^\circ.
What is the area of this quadrilateral?
